title.label: Coles - Coles Supermarkets Australia Pty Ltd

content.label:
The worst app ever. Soon as you get to the checkout there's a system error,
                 happens all the time. Uninstalled ðŸ‘Ž

Needs to have the items price included,
                 so it's easier to decide what you want to buy. Also will help to manage your total bill and budget.

Doesn't show aisles for local store,
                 doesn't show cost of items

I likes this update. It make the shopping very easy. The reason for giving it four not five,
                 because I would like to see the follwing in the next updates:n1- the ability to share the shopping list to open in another device inside the app it self,
                 not as an email. you cann see an app called myShopi.n2- When I add items to shopping list,
                 I would like to see the estimated price for my list and the estimated flyubuys. you have all these information stored somewhere. nnWe are human always look for more :)

I used to use this app every time before going to shop in Coles,
                 because it was easy to build up a shopping list. But not anymore ever since this app had a design overhaul. Now it's difficult to use,
                 and it freezes all the times. Not to mention,
                 the product search function is still as broken as ever. Often have to waste a lot of time searching but still can't find a particular product that supposedly is in the paper catalogue.

One of your competitor stores is a 6 kilometre drive from home,
                 Coles is about 10. n Before I go to either I use the apps to try and see where the best price is - for example the cordial we drink is half price this week at $2.07 /2L according to your competitors app. Coles app does not have a price at all. Guess where I go for that cordial? And magazines,
                 and fruit,
                 and toiletries etc while I'm there?

I shop online; it's faster,
                 easier,
                 and considering the ancillary costs of a grocery trip to the shops it's also cheaper. I was hoping this app might let me add items to my trolley. I was hoping I might even be able to add items based on a scanned barcode. Nope!nnIn fact,
                 the app seems pretty useless unless you add a Flybuys card. Sorry,
                 I'll pass.
Would be even better to use if it had prices for all items - not just  specials. That way you can compare prices with other stores. Woollies have prices on all their items on their app.
This app doesn't seem to have many useful features. My local specials never show up and I believe that the
feature is meant to show you when your chosen items are on special? A major flaw is that the app doesn't show prices!

The app is stable and easy to use. Need to be able to view specials by category; grocery,
                 dairy,
                 frozen.nLacking ingredients list for each product,
                 would save a lot of time since you could check before going to buy the product.nNeeds to default to closest store when the app is open as customers see specials that are not applicable to our store.

The app is fairly good..can you guys add an option to add the my coles card in it.that would be great.I actually didn't get why people are saying this is the worst app ever..maybe they go to woolies :v.

What's the magic word or button to open this app??? Two days now I've opened and closed this app with nothing but the Coles logo on the screen. Haven't seen anything other than it! Why are you not opening!!!!!ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜

Does some things right like showing the aisle of the product,
                 linking flybuys etcnnBut...nnWhy can't I see the catalogue and add items to my list from the catalogue?nnWhy do only items that are on special display the price? Why is pricing so hidden?? The price is a major part of shopping!
Please add a
function like other grocery list apps that enable real time syncing of lists across grouped users. That would make this very family friendly.

Because it keeps saying network error when I try to navigate it or enter my suburb. Useless,
                 considering all other apps etc are working fine.
Why not link the fuel vouchers to the app?? It's inconvenient & archaic to carry around paper bits & pieces.

What a mission it is setting up this lovely little gem of complexity - I think the entire project had junior BAs aboard. nnWant to shop online - well then get ready to capture your email address over and over - your passwords over and over and that flybuys login you created a hundred years ago - well yup can't do the setup without it . nnNot worth it in my experience - Stocard does a better job with the flybuys and it's quicker to drive to Coles and buy your groceries than trying to navigate this app.

Lots of glitches. Items repeated on every list (BB,
                 specials etc) when I scroll to the bottom and it loads the next lot,
                 it repeats over items and over and you end up scrolling up and down to see things. nI won't use this app unless it has major upgrades.

This app is terrible. Can't find anything so much in the unknown aisle section.nThe cart is no longer in aisle order so I have to scroll through the whole list in each aisle and hope I don't miss anything. This wastes so much time.  Go back to the old app!
Good ideas but poor execution...nLikes - great linking to my Flybuys and automatically populating by BB Buy Before screens. n- like the
function.n- like the

function that shows you which aisle in the store BUT massive DISLIKE that it's nowhere near right for any of my local stores.nDislikes - slow and glitchy with screens freezing regularly. n- disliked not being able to turn off the Aisle feature and sort the list myself.....

This would have to be one of the best shopping apps EVER - I don't know what everyone means with their complaints but after checking out the upgrade I find using the app a breeze - I load my shopping list to my iPad and I NEVER have to go down the wrong aisle for no reason ever again....  I can't tell you how many people have stopped me while shopping in the last 6-8 weeks to ask about the app (at least 10) and every single one of them has asked me to load the app on their iPhone or iPad so they can start using it.  I met one lady again after I had done this and she gave me a hug as she was soooo happy with how much easier the app had made shopping for her...  I would NEVER be without my Coles app - I'm afraid it leaves the Woolworths nightmare app completely in the shade.

title.label: Add Apple Watch facility for Flybuys

content.label:
I like the fact that you have added Flybuys facility to your mobile app so that we no longer have to bring our Flybuys card. It would be great if you could add an Apple Watch version,
                 so that we can leave our phone in our pockets. It shouldn't be much effort to do as many iPhone apps also have an Apple Watch app thet either runs standalone or in conjunction with the iPhone app.nnAlso,
                 you should consider supporting Apple Pay on Coles Credit Cards. You could gain a lot of customers while 3 of the big 4 banks remain so intransigent.

I love using the Coles app,
                 makes shopping with a baby that bit quicker. I would rate 5 stars but there are some items that don't have an isle number,
                 and I wish it would show prices of items.

Would be fantastic,
                 if they were linked to the app.
I thought Woolworths app was bad but this is worse

title.label: What were they thinking? Or weren't they!

content.label:
OMG,
                 this has to be one of the worst apps I've ever seen. How do they think people's minds work? Either I have to make my way through the entire store to find the specials or have my own personal crystal ball to guess what might be by entering a search item. If I just wanted to write a shopping list I guess Coles has never heard of a pen and paper. Go back to the drawing board please Coles and while you're at it ask some real shoppers how they shop. Terrible waste of time!

I really like this app. It's well laid out and it performs well.nnCreating a shopping list is really easy,
                 and I particularly like the Bought Before feature because I usually buy the same things.nnWould be great to be able to export the shopping list to the Reminders app if that is even possible because I use my Apple Watch to tick things off as I walk around the store. And sort them by aisle too - some products have no aisle number available.nnPrices and product info should be available in the app so I can choose which product to buy before I add them to my list.nnThe recipe section is handy too. Would be good if there was some indicator of the total cost of the ingredients so I can find a recipe that suits my budget.

When going through the specials- the new horizontal scroller is infuriating to use and going to each section takes ages to load up and often freezes. I also find the placement of items under each section questionable - i.e. Meat & Deli section is always filled with packaged dips,
                 International foods has cheddar cheese or rice crackers,
                 Healthy Living has ham in a can?

One of those apps whereby a major 'upgrade' has removed huge amounts of functionality. All products currently showing up as 'aisle unknown' where as previously used to sort my list based on the location of products within my store. Was previously a 5 star app to my mind in the past but now it has been ruined.

title.label: Would have been good...but no prices!

content.label: This would be fantastic except it doesn't show prices when adding to shopping list - why? How can I select what brand etc I want without knowing the price? Can't find the the send to online shopping button either. Disappointed

Its ok,
                 but you can't do online shopping through the app and it doesn't display images or prices through the list. Woolworths is much better. Make online shopping easier and clear,
                 that's the future for the busy families.
This app is completely useless in every way Woolworths is great

Search for vegan food: animal crackers,
                 hand lotion,
                 cheeseburger Pringles! You'd think a supermarket would understand what vegan means ! Apparently not
Can you please fix the Manor Lakes app. None of the aisles match up. It makes it very hard to do shopping using the app.
So easy to use and very useful! Will recommend to friends :)

Have just updated the app. Tried to look at my previously bought items and I am prompted to add my flybuys card. Don't have one. Don't want one. Just want to do my shopping.nLooks like it's back to the desktop computer for me. nDisappointing.

Was not able to find info from my local store despite repeated attempts at different times and when I added my flybuys number it wouldn't accept my password- I reset my password and it still wouldn't accept it. This app is meant to be helpful but it is the opposite.

title.label: Flybuys login failed #2 on latest version

content.label:
I know it's been logged already. Just confirming the issue. I'm having issue adding flybuys card as well with current details. I am able to login via Coles credit card app and browsers via mobile (iOS) using the same credentials. 1 star until issue is resolved. Already reached out via app feedback form and email,
                 support team is telling me to reset password instead. No dice there.

Would be so much better if you could copy items from one list to another and add products to any list rather than just defaulting to another. Used to be able,
                 now you can't.

title.label: Does it need to check my location?

content.label: Does it need to check my location in every aisle as I go through my shopping list? It is annoying specially that the reception in the local Coles is not the best. Slows me down and annoys me. Please fix it

The app won't let me add my Flybuys card because it thinks the card number or password is incorrect,
                 which it isn't. 1 star rating until Coles fixes this issue.

This is a great app but for the fact it checks the location everytime you are in the app. Is that necessary? Everytime I close the phone in the fruit and veg section and open it again it checks the location before giving me my shopping list. Fix it please.

There are so many problems with the latest 2 updates. The items on the list take up way too much space now that the item text is spread over 3 lines. Now I can only see 3-4 items on the screen and I have to scroll a lot to see items where previously I could see 10+ items on a screen at once.  This is particularly annoying when I have 40+ items on my list every week.  Also there is so much wasted space when the product text only take up one line eg. bananas.  It still goes over 3 lines.  Also I don't like the quantity controls on the list as they take up too much space and I can't see as much product text.  When adding products,
                 the special and add to list buttons take up way too much space,
                 over half the screen together and chops off the information that I actually want to see.  Why isn't the barcode scanner there to add items?  Why would you have a separate product search icon? This should also be under the add items section.  The add items search takes way too long often over 10 seconds.  Finding the store and loading the specials takes way too long every time I open the app especially when I am at the store going through the aisles.  It shouldn't need to reload the specials every single time I open the app.  It should only refresh when something has actually changed like once a week when the specials change.  Also don't like the auto scrolling back to the top of the list on opening the app when I am going through the store and start in the produce section then move to the deli before going to aisle 1. Leave the scroll bar where I had it.  The only thing I like with the latest 2 updates is where the got it list now is but it has its own problems. It has some random order,
                 why doesn't it have the same order as the list like it used to?  And why can't I delete from the got it list directly or at least clear all the items there?  Honestly this app is now rubbish and a pain to use. It is a really bad user experience and I would really like to go back to version 2.3
Love this app. Makes shopping so much faster. Like the new update except it's not allowing me to login once I move my list to online shopping.
Absolutely love this app! Use it every week. I always end up saving at least $15.  I have $300 in my savings account now.

I'm surprised this app passed the design board. nnThe app doesn't let you sign into your online coles account. Instead is manages its on independent shopping lists and carts. nnThe Woolworths app allows you to sign into itself and the website with  the same account. Which provides a synced shopping cart and user lists. nnWhat on earth where you guys thinking?

Would be even better if we could use the shop online web site to choose items,
                 then send them to the app. I know you can now do it the other way around,
                 but being able to send online shopping to the app would make shopping even faster :)

Not only is this now a great app,
                 but they responded very quickly to an issue I had adding the flybuys card. Very impressed.

This update is useless. I had over 200 items on my shopping list,
                 now they have disappeared. So now have to redo. Where's the scanner gone

Great to use for my shopping list,
                 then it tells me what to get in each aisle from my list. Some issues with looking up items and scanning barcodes since last update. I love how it links to flybuys and my previously bought items. Real time saver now. Jump on and see if it works for you too
